get.summary: Extract active NGP service offers info
Extract historical versions info of an active NGP service offer

id.description: An auto-generated id for the attachment so that it can be referenced (eg. for downloading)

s3Key.description: The key to the file to retrieve it from S3 service

FeeInitiated.description: Pricing components parking fee initialization type

cancellationPeriod.description: Number of days after cancellation of the service offer while subscriptions to this service offer are still active.

minimumTerm.description: Minimum number of days for subscriptions (a subscription cannot be cancelled if it is not live for at least that many days).

offerToAll.description: Shows if the service offer is subscribable for anybody or it is subscribable only for some partners.

partnerInternalId.description: Identifier provided by the partner (not related to DB id).

periodOfNotice.description: The number of days before the end of the service offer when subscribers should be notified. Must be null for unlimited service offers.

periodOfNoticeMessage.description: The notification text for the notifications about the end of a service offer.

serviceOfferId.description: Identifier to be assigned to the new Service Offer entity (for NGP only)

serviceTypeVersion.description: Service type version of this service offer.

subscriberPartnerIds.description: Ids of partners for whom the service offer is subscribable in case of bilateral service offer, null otherwise.

twoStepProcess.description: Does the service offer require two-step process acceptance?

twoStepRequiredMasterDataFields.description: Two Step Required Master Data Fields for service offer for two step process acceptance.

unlimited.description: Is the service offer is unlimited service offer.

validFrom.description: The service offer is valid from that time.

validTo.description: The service offer is valid until that time.

attachments.description: File attachments for the service offer.

cancellationPeriod.description: Number of days after cancellation of the service offer while subscriptions to this service offer are still active.

cancellationTo.description: The service offer becomes inactive at this time (if set).

createdBy.description: User id / SYSTEM of the modifier. The user id is sent by the portal in core request call

id.description: Auto-generated, internally used id for the partner.

lastModifiedBy.description: User id / SYSTEM of the modifier. The user id is sent by the portal in core request call

minimumTerm.description: Minimum number of days for subscriptions (a subscription cannot be cancelled if it is not live for at least that many days).

nextServiceOfferId.description: The unlimited service offer next service offer id

offerToAll.description: Shows if the service offer is subscribable for anybody or it is subscribable only for some partners.

originalServiceOfferId.description: The unlimited service offer original service offer id

originalValidFrom.description: The original unlimited service offer valid from

ownerPartnerId.description: Id of the partner who created the service offer.

periodOfNotice.description: The number of days before the end of the service offer when subscribers should be notified.

periodOfNoticeMessage.description: The notification text for the notifications about the end of a service offer.

previousServiceOfferId.description: The unlimited service offer previous service offer id

serviceTypeVersion.description: Service type version of this service offer.

subscriberPartnerIds.description: Ids of partners for whom the sevice offer is subscribable in case of bilateral service offer, null otherwise.

twoStepProcess.description: Does the service offer require two-step process acceptance?

twoStepRequiredMasterDataFields.description: Two Step Required Master Data Fields for service offer for two step process acceptance.

unlimited.description: Is the service offer is unlimited service offer.

validFrom.description: The service offer is valid from that time.

validTo.description: The service offer is valid until that time.

version.description: The version of the unlimited service offer

serviceTypeId.description: Id of the service type of this service offer.

serviceTypeName.description: Name of the service type of this service offer.

serviceTypeVersionNumber.description: Version number of the service type version.

cancellationTo.description: The subscription becomes inactive at this time (if set).

createdBy.description: User id / SYSTEM of the modifier. The user id is sent by the portal in core request call

lastModifiedBy.description: User id / SYSTEM of the modifier. The user id is sent by the portal in core request call

offererPartnerId.description: Id of the offerer partner of the service offer. Use serviceOffer.ownerPartner.id to sort by this field.

offererPartnerName.description: (Optional) Name of the offerer partner of the service offer. Use serviceOffer.ownerPartner.partnerName to sort by this field.

periodOfNotice.description: The number of days before the end of the service offer when subscribers should be notified.

periodOfNoticeMessage.description: The notification text for the notifications about the end of a subscription.

rejectedDate.description: Date and time of the decline for the subscription.

requestedDate.description: Date and time of the request for the subscription.

serviceOfferId.description: Id of the serviceoffer. Use serviceOffer.id to sort by this field.

serviceOfferName.description: (Optional) Name of the service offer. Use serviceOffer.name to sort by this field.

serviceTypeId.description: Id of the service type of the service offer. Use serviceOffer.serviceTypeVersion.serviceType.id to sort by this field.

serviceTypeName.description: (Optional) Name of the service type of the service offer. Use serviceOffer.serviceTypeVersion.serviceType.name to sort by this field.

subscribeDate.description: Date and time of creation of the subscription.

subscriberPartnerExternalId.description: External Partner id of the subscriber

subscriberPartnerId.description: Partner id of the subscriber. Use subscriberPartner.id to sort by this field.

subscriberPartnerName.description: (Optional) Partner name of the subscriber. Use subscriberPartner.partnerName to sort by this field.

twoStepData.description: Two steps data for partner acceptance service offer.

validFrom.description: The time from which the subscription is valid.

validTo.description: The time until the subscription is active.

wasSubscribed.description: Was EMP ever subscribe to this service offer

nextServiceOfferId.description: Identifier to be assigned to the new Service Offer entity (for NGP only)

updateDate.description: The time to start the new pricing

Unlimited NGP update.description: Service offer update for unlimited NGP pricing
